original_text:
The blessing of him who was about to perish came upon me,
    and I caused the widow's heart to sing for joy.
korean_text: 망하게 된 자도 나를 위하여 복을 빌었으며 과부의 마음이 나로 말미암아 기뻐 노래하였느니라

sentences.original_text: The blessing of him who was about to perish
and I caused the widow's heart to sing for joy
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 과부의 마음이 기쁨으로 노래하게 했습니다
